Profile

EDUCATION

Master of IT in Business, major in Analytics

Institute : Singapore Management University ( SMU )

Period: August 2022 to November 2023

Some of the modules I have undertaken ⇳
  • Applied Geospatial Analytics

    Project : Regionalisation to uncover insights into water points across 774 districts in Nigeria.

    Project Details : Performed spatially & non-spatially constrained cluster analysis for functional & non-functional water points by various attributes, used R/Posit.

  • Applied Healthcare Analytics

    Project : Comparison 5 machine learning (ML) models to predict hospitalisation, ED and ICU admission.

    Project Details : Explored Logistic Regression(LR), Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, Multilayer Perceptron & eXtreme Gradient Boosting (XGB) & evaluated these models' outcomes based on precision, recall, sensitivity & AUPRC score, used Python.

  • Big Data Tools & Technology

    Project : Designing a scalable big data solution for a sports company with 10 stores in Southeast Asia & 100+ retail venues worldwide.

    Project Details : Proposed a solution based on Hadoop ecosystem to address different data sources & data types, the volume & velocity aspect of data ingestion, and the veracity aspects of the processing requirement.

  • Customers Analytics & Application

    Project : Identify bottlenecks and revenue options for a kitchenware manufacturer (not fictitious).

    Project Details : Performed customer segmentation (RFM & K-means clustering), geospatial distribution & market-basket analysis to improve sales opportunities via product pairings & optimise internal resources distribution across Peninsular Malaysia, with Python and R/Posit.

  • Cybersecurity Technology & Application

    Topics covered :symmetric & asymmetric encryption, HMAC, network, software and web security, K-Anonymity

    Project : Using Large Language Model (LLM) to manage software vulnerability.

    Project Details : Explored how LLM can be used to detect the vulnerability and the trade-off in using it for code recovery.

  • Data Analytics Lab

    Project : Comparison 4 ML algorithms to predict a user's creditworthiness for a financial loan.

    Project Details : Explored the prediction by LR, boosted trees, bootstrap forest & XGB based on first-timer loaners & recurrent loaners datasets, used JMP Pro.

    Project : Discover Singapore land usage captured by Sentinal-2 L2A satellite images via unsupervised ML techniques.

    Project Details : Used K-means & normal mixture clustering to extract and compare the land usage for different bandwidths of satellite images, used JMP Pro.

  • Data Management

    Project : Designing an entity relationship (ER) model & query optimisation for big data.

    Project Details : Designed ER model for a volunteers' management system and explored a Composite Index & Partition approach to optimise queries, with MySQL.

  • Data Science for Business - Python programming for data analysis.

  • Query Processing & Optimisation - Explored Composite Index and Partition approach to optimise a query.

  • Excel Modelling for Decision Making - Modelled Singapore Food Consumption Patterns & CO2 Emissions by 2030.

  • Sustainable Finance

    Topics covered :ESG, Inclusive Finance, Sustainable Debt, Sustainable Risks, Impact Investment, Sustainable Reporting

    Project : Proposing a sustainable infrastructure fund that creates social or environmental impact or value(fictitious).

    Project Details : Proposed a country-adapted private fund that specifically target District Cooling solution for Brunei, with fund management fee, carried interests upon successful exit, locked down period, identified risks and target investors.

  • Sustainable Impact

  • Visual Analytics & Applications - R/Posit, Tableau, Shiny, GitHub, Quarto portfolio.
